text:
[Verse]
Moonlight city's glow
Stars light up the show
Walking streets alone
Where do those dreams go

[Verse 2]
Neon lights and signs
Shadows blur the lines
Footsteps echo near
But I’ve got no fear

[Chorus]
Nighttime wanderer
Lonely traveler
Lost but feeling free
It's just you and me

[Verse 3]
Whispers on the breeze
Dancing through the trees
Night’s our secret place
Where hearts find their pace

[Bridge]
City never sleeps
Darkness runs so deep
But in this twilight
Love shines in the night

[Chorus]
Nighttime wanderer
Lonely traveler
Lost but feeling free
It's just you and me
title: Nighttime Wanderer
